definition: an individual's prescribed share of work, supply sparingly and with restricted quantities
details:
noun
- an individual's prescribed share of work
= example: an individual's prescribed share of work
- smallest American sandpiper
= synonyms: least sandpiper
- an unbroken period of time during which you do something
= synonyms: stretch
verb
- supply sparingly and with restricted quantities
= synonyms: skimp, scant
- subsist on a meager allowance
= synonyms: skimp, scrimp
